title: "After Frida" headline sans in Sunday NYTimes Magazine
content:
Today's Sunday NYTimes Magazine used an interesting sans display face unknown to me. Can anybody ID it?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213830im_/http:/typophile.com/files/displaysample_5625.png)
author: mondoB

comments.content:
it might be [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/paralucent/heavy/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018213830/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/paralucent/heavy/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/paralucent/heavy/")  
with the As and Rs modified, nice though
